subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ryan Palmer shot a bogey-free six-under 64 to take the first-round lead in the Byron Nelson Championship, a year after losing a playoff to Keegan Bradley in the event in Irving, Tex.
snippet: Ryan Palmer shot a bogey-free six-under 64 to take the first-round lead in the Byron Nelson Championship, a year after losing a playoff to Keegan Bradley in the event in Irving, Tex.
